Address.label: Address
Address.value: 400 N. ELM STREET, GREENSBORO, North Carolina, 27401, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Kontoor Brands Inc is a lifestyle apparel company. It is engaged in designing, manufacturing, sourcing, marketing, and distribution of its portfolio of brands, including Wrangler and Lee. It manufactures its products in owned and leased facilities and distributes the products through both brick and mortar and e-commerce retailers. It generates the majority of its revenue from the Wrangler segment. The company's geographical segments are the United States and International, of which most of its revenue comes from the United States.
